body_html:
https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#nvidia_requirements_to_run_tensorflow_with_gpu_support
As stated in the web page above, TF 1.8 is compatible with CUDA 9.0
We have no prebuilt binaries that are compatible with cuda 9.2. for cuda 9.2, you need to build from sources.

https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#nvidia_requirements_to_run_tensorflow_with_gpu_support

We have no prebuilt binaries that are compatible with cuda 9.2. for cuda 9.2, you need to build from sources.
